title: Video Index
body:
This page contains a list and links to all available videos on how to use various aspects of Network360. This list is categorized by functionality and modules.

Navigation

[How to Video: Home Screen](#!/help/articles/how-to-video-home-screen) * This video shows the different areas of the Home Screen of Network360.\ **Time: 04:48** [How to Video: Navigating Network360](#!/help/articles/how-to-video-navigation-within-network360) * This video shows you how to maneuver within Network360.\ **Time: 01:53** [How to Video: Settings](#!/help/articles/how-to-videos-settings) * This video shows the settings available, such as data last updated dates and user administration.\ **Time: 01:11**
# Common Functionality [How to Video: My Things](#!/help/articles/how-to-video-my-things) * This video explains how you can access things you had previously created.\ **Time: 00:33** [How to Video: Selection Criteria - Geography](#!/help/articles/how-to-video-selection-criteria-geo) * This video will help you understand how the Geography field is used in search criteria.\ **Time: 04:25** [How to Video: Population Files](#!/help/articles/how-to-video-population-files) * This video helps in understanding how to create and use population files.\ **Time: 01:19** [How to Video: All Geographies](#!/help/articles/how-to-video-all-geographies) * This video will help you to understand how to include all geographies in the project in the search criteria.\ **Time: 00:37** # Competitive Dashboard Module [How to Video: Competitive Dashboard Selection and Summary](#!/help/articles/how-to-video-competitive-dashboard-selection-and-summary) * This video is a walkthrough of the search criteria to create a Competitive Dashboard and an explanation of the dashboard results.\ **Time: 08:11** [How to Video: Top Network - View Details](#!/help/articles/how-to-video-top-network-view-details) * This video explains how to view the details of the Top Networks within the Competitive Dashboard.\ **Time: 01:33** [How to Video: Market Penetration](#!/help/articles/how-to-video-market-penetration) * This video explains the Market Penetration details within the Competitive Dashboard.\ **Time: 01:19** [How to Video: Provider List Drilldown](#!/help/articles/how-to-video-provider-list-drilldown) * This video shows the various details and options with the Provider List.\ **Time: 01:12** [How to Video: Export Options](!/help/articles/how-to-video-export-options) * This video explains the Export options that are available within several modules. It also reviews the output using examples from the Competitive Dashboard.\ **Time: 05:56** # Compare Networks Module [How to Video: Compare Networks Selection](#!/help/articles/how-to-video-compare-networks-selection) * This video suggests a use case on when the **Compare Networks** module is useful and explains the search criteria.\ **Time: 01:44** [How to Video: Overlap](/#!/help/articles/how-to-video-overlap) * This video helps you in understanding the overlap analysis of providers within selected networks within the **Compare Networks** module. \ **Time: 02:12** [How to Video: Monthly Volatility](/#!/help/articles/how-to-video-monthly-volatility) * This video reviews the Average Monthly Volatility (providers added and deleted) of selected networks within the **Compare Networks** module.\ **Time: 03:07** [How to Video: Top Specialty Groups](/#!/help/articles/how-to-video-top-specialty-groups) * This video explains the top specialties section of the **Compare Networks** module results. It includes an overview of the top 5 specialties and the ability to see more details such as the market penetration of each specialty.\ **Time: 01:58** [How to Video: Network Strength](/#!/help/articles/how-to-video-network-strength) * This video explains the Network Strength section of the **Compare Networks** results. It shows how the information is presented in a map view by zip code and how to drill down into the map for more details.\ **Time: 02:09** [How to Video: Export Options](/#!/help/articles/how-to-video-export-options) * This video explains the Export options available within the **Compare Networks** module.\ **Time: 02:14** # Recruitment & Research Module [How to Video: Look up a Provider](/#!/help/articles/how-to-video-look-up-a-provider) * This video shows how to look up provider details within the **Recruitment & Research** module. It touches on the **Provider Tags** and **Comments** functionality that are also found in other modules.\ **Time: 06:13** [How to Video: Exporting Provider Data](/#!/help/articles/how-to-video-exporting-provider-data) * This video explains the options available when exporting provider details from within the **Recruitment & Research** module. It also explains the **Export List Codes**.\ **Time: 02:38** [How to Video: Provider Detail Export](/#!/help/articles/how-to-video-provider-detail-export) * This video explains how to analyze the exported provider details file that was created in the "Exporting Provider Data" video.\ **Time: 04:11** # Create a List [How to Video: Create a List Criteria](/#!/help/articles/how-to-video-create-a-list-criteria) * This video gives you an overview of the search criteria fields within the Create a List functionality, which is useful for recruitment.\ **Time: 03:25** [How to Video: Create a List Summary View](/#!/help/articles/how-to-video-create-a-list-summary-view) * This video provides an overview of the Summary results of the Create a List report and how to analyze the information.\ **Time: 03:32** [How to Video: Create a List Detail Results](/#!/help/articles/how-to-video-create-a-list-detail-results) * This video provides an overview of the provider details that can be accessed by drilling down into a provider within the Create a List report and how to export the details. \ **Time: 03:32** [How to Video: Create a List Export](/#!/help/articles/how-to-video-create-a-list-export) * This video explains how to analyze the exported provider details file that was created in the "Create a List Detail Results" video.\ **Time: 06:09**
